tool_description: Find which shows are airing today, tomorrow, in the next 7 days, or in the next 31 days
name: Show Air Dates
title: Show Air Dates

api_list.name: Next 31 days
api_list.description: Shows airing in the next 31 days
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://show-air-dates.p.rapidapi.com/next31days"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "show-air-dates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
